description.brazilian: Complete o jogo de festa com 1 clique.
description.english: Complete the boba party game with only 1 click.
description.schinese: 在奶茶派对游戏中，只点击一次完成挑战。
description.spanish: Completa el juego de fiesta con 1 clic.

description.brazilian: Esconder-se em uma caixa de papelão 10 vezes.
description.spanish: Esconderse en una caja de cartón 10 veces.

description.brazilian: Esconder-se em uma caixa de papelão 50 vezes.
description.spanish: Esconderse en una caja de cartón 50 veces.

description.brazilian: Esconder-se em uma caixa de papelão 100 vezes.
description.spanish: Esconderse en una caja de cartón 100 veces.

description.brazilian: Obter todas as conquistas do caminho dourado
description.schinese: 完成所有黄金之道成就。
description.spanish: Obtener todos los logros del camino dorado

displayName.spanish: La cosa se va a poner fea

description.english: Complete Tutorial: "I Put A Spell On You".

description.brazilian: Complete o tutorial: "A sombra sobre Innsmouth".
description.spanish: Completa el tutorial: "La sombra sobre Innsmouth".

description.schinese: 以怪物身份成功完成3次祭典。
以怪物身份成功完成10次祭典。
以怪物身份成功完成50次祭典。

displayName.russian: Волк в овечьей… ну это вот все

description.english: Disguise yourself 10 times as a human.
Disguise yourself 100 times as a human.
Disguise yourself 200 times as a human.

description.brazilian: Abrir todas as portas no jogo da casa de bonecas.
description.english: Open all the doors in dollhouse party game.
description.russian: Открыть все двери в движухе «Кукольный дом»
description.schinese: 在玩具屋派对游戏中，打开所有的门。
description.spanish: Abrir todas las puertas en el juego de la casa de muñecas.

description.brazilian: Roubar um item de um mesmo jogador duas vezes.
description.english: Steal from the same player twice.
description.russian: Дважды украсть предмет у одного и того же игрока
description.schinese: 在同一天偷取同一名玩家的原料2次。
description.spanish: Robar un ítem de un mismo jugador dos veces.

description.brazilian: Ficar na sala de jogos da mansão por mais de 50% do tempo durante a fase de coleta.
description.english: Stay in the Game Room of the mansion for more than 50% of the gather phase time.
description.russian: Не покидать игровую комнату поместья во время фазы сбора пока не пройдет половина ее времени
description.schinese: 待在古堡里的游戏屋中超过50%的收集时间。
description.spanish: Estar en la sala de juegos de la mansión por más del 50% del tiempo durante la fase de recolección.

description.english: Get 30 ingredients from playing party games from a barrel.
description.schinese: 通过玩派对游戏，获得30个祭典原料。

description.english: Get 100 ingredients from playing party games from a barrel.
description.schinese: 通过玩派对游戏，获得100个祭典原料。

description.english: Get 200 ingredients from playing party games from a barrel.
description.schinese: 通过玩派对游戏，获得200个祭典原料。

description.brazilian: Usar a comunicação por voz 10 vezes.
description.english: Use the intercom for a total of 10 times.
description.spanish: Usar la comunicación por voz 10 veces.

description.brazilian: Usar a comunicação por voz 50 vezes.
description.english: Use the intercom for a total of 50 times.
description.spanish: Usar la comunicación por voz 50 veces.

description.brazilian: Usar a comunicação por voz 100 vezes.
description.english: Use the intercom for a total of 100 times.
description.spanish: Usar la comunicación por voz 100 veces.

description.english: Get jailed a total of 10 times.

description.brazilian: Derrubar outros jogadores duas vezes na tela de vitória.
description.english: Kick other players twice in the same win screen.
description.russian: Дважды пнуть других игроков на экране победы
description.schinese: 在获胜屏幕中，踢到别的玩家至少2次。
description.spanish: Derribar a otros jugadores dos veces en la pantalla de victoria.

description.schinese: 以人类身份打晕5名玩家。

displayName.english: Nose bleed on the chess board

description.schinese: 以人类身份打晕25名玩家。
以人类身份打晕50名玩家。

description.brazilian: Terminar de jogar o Ritual Night após a meia-noite.
description.english: Stop playing Ritual Night at midnight.
description.russian: Закончить играть в Ritual Night после полуночи
description.spanish: Terminar de jugar el Ritual Night después de la medianoche.

description.brazilian: Terminar pelo menos 5 jogos de festa em menos de 6 segundos.
description.english: Finish at least 5 party games in party game time trials under 6 seconds.
description.russian: Завершить как минимум 5 движух в испытаниях менее чем за 6 секунд
description.schinese: 在6秒内完成至少5个派对游戏挑战。
description.spanish: Terminar al menos 5 juegos de fiesta en menos de 6 segundos.

description.brazilian: Jogar 10 partidas sem banner ou tag.
description.english: Play 10 games without equipping banner or tag.
description.russian: Сыграть 10 игр без рамки или значка
description.schinese: 不装备任何背景或名牌玩10场游戏。
description.spanish: Jugar 10 partidas sin banner o tag.

displayName.brazilian: Ei cara, onde estão os meus cromas?
Pessoal discreto em fantasias de monstro
displayName.spanish: Personal discreto en disfraces de monstruo

description.schinese: 以人类身份完成1场游戏。
以怪物身份完成1场游戏。

description.brazilian: Começar a jogar o Ritual Night antes do meio-dia.
description.russian: Начать играть в Ritual Night до полудня
description.spanish: Comenzar a jugar el Ritual Night antes del mediodía.

displayName.brazilian: Não posso fazer melhor do que isso
displayName.spanish: No puedo hacer mejor que esto

description.brazilian: Elevar o nível do item de aparência 1 vez.
description.russian: Прокачать уровень престижа для предмета внешности 1 р.
description.spanish: Subir de nivel el ítem de apariencia 1 vez.

description.brazilian: Elevar o nível do item de aparência 5 vezes.
description.russian: Прокачать уровень престижа для предмета внешности 5 р.
description.spanish: Subir de nivel el ítem de apariencia 5 veces.

description.brazilian: Elevar o nível do item de aparência 10 vezes.
description.russian: Прокачать уровень престижа для предмета внешности 10 р.
description.spanish: Subir de nivel el ítem de apariencia 10 veces.

displayName.english: Trust me bro, we are in this together

description.brazilian: Fugir da prisão no lugar de outro jogador.
description.english: Steal another player's chance to get out of the jail.
description.russian: Сбежать из тюрьмы вместо другого игрока
description.schinese: 偷走另一名玩家离开大牢的机会。
description.spanish: Escapar de la prisión en lugar de otro jugador.

displayName.brazilian: O Grande Irmão está te observando
displayName.spanish: El Gran Hermano te está observando

description.brazilian: Olhar atrás do quadro da mansão.
description.english: Get a glimpse of what's to come behind a painting in the mansion.
description.schinese: 在古堡中，看见藏在画后的秘密。
description.spanish: Mirar detrás del cuadro de la mansión.

description.brazilian: Ver os fogos de artifício na festa de tocar o sino.
description.english: See the fireworks in ring the bell party game.
description.russian: Увидеть фейерверки в движухе «По ком звонит колокол»
description.schinese: 在大铁锤派对游戏中，看见烟火。
description.spanish: Ver los fuegos artificiales en la fiesta de tocar la campana.

description.english: Steal 10 ingredients from another player as a human.
description.schinese: 以人类身份偷取10个原料。

description.english: Steal 50 ingredients from another player as a human.
description.schinese: 以人类身份偷取50个原料。

displayName.brazilian: O nome da conquista foi roubado
displayName.spanish: El nombre del logro fue robado

description.english: Steal 50 ingredients from another player as a human.
description.schinese: 以人类身份偷取50个原料。

displayName.brazilian: Tem certeza de que vai conseguir sozinho?
displayName.english: Don't like us holding your hand?
displayName.spanish: ¿Estás seguro de que puedes hacerlo solo?

description.brazilian: Jogar 15 partidas sem equipar itens de aparência.
description.english: Play 15 games without equipping any cosmetics.
description.russian: Сыграть 15 игр без рамки или значка
description.schinese: 不装备任何皮肤玩15场游戏。
description.spanish: Jugar 15 partidas sin equipar ítems de apariencia.

description.english: Squash the Mole-n in whack-a-mole party game.
description.schinese: 在打地鼠派对游戏中，成功击中地瓜。
description.spanish: Ganar en el juego de golpear a las toupeiras
